00035 RainbruRPG::Gui::AddPlayer::AddPlayer(PlayerList* pl)
00036                           :Fl_Window( 400, 300, "Create a player") {
00037 
00038   playerList=pl;
00039 
00040   srand( (unsigned) time( NULL ));
00041   cars="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789";
00042 
00043     name =new Fl_Input( 100, 20, 100, 30, "Name");
00044     password =new Fl_Output( 100, 60, 100, 30, "Password");
00045     mail =new Fl_Input( 100, 100, 250, 30, "Mail adress");
00046 
00047     Fl_Button* cancelBtn = new Fl_Button( 10, 260, 100, 30, "Cancel" );
00048     Fl_Button* rollBtn = new Fl_Button( 200-55, 260, 100, 30, "Roll" );
00049     Fl_Button* okBtn = new Fl_Button( 400-110, 260, 100, 30, "OK" );
00050 
00051   end();
00052 
00053   cancelBtn->callback(cbCancel, this);
00054   rollBtn->callback(cbRoll, this);
00055   okBtn->callback(cbOk, this);
00056   this->set_modal();
00057 
00058   this->show();
00059   roll();
00060 }

00066   name       =NULL;
00067   password   =NULL;
00068   playerList =NULL;
00069 }

00086 void RainbruRPG::Gui::AddPlayer::i_cbRoll(){

00105 void RainbruRPG::Gui::AddPlayer::i_cbCancel(){

00119   ( (AddPlayer*)f )->i_cbOk();

00128 void RainbruRPG::Gui::AddPlayer::i_cbOk(){
00129   CurlPlayerAdd tpa;
00130   tpa.setPostedData("name", name->value());
00131   tpa.setPostedPwd("pwd", password->value());
00132   tpa.setPostedData("mail", mail->value());
00133 
00134   bool success=tpa.perform();
00135 
00136   if (!success)
00137     ShowCurlError::showError(&tpa);
00138 
00139   playerList->refresh();
00140   this->hide();
00141 }
00142 
00151 void RainbruRPG::Gui::AddPlayer::roll(){
00152   // We take a random number between 0 and cars.lenght()-1
00153 
00154   string mdp;
00155 
00156   for (int j=0; j<8; j++){
00157     int i=random(cars.length());
00158     char c = cars[i];
00159     mdp+=c;
00160   }
00161   password->value( mdp.c_str() );
00162 }
00163 
00169 int RainbruRPG::Gui::AddPlayer::random(int max){
00170   int a=(int) ((float)max * (float)rand() / (float)RAND_MAX);
00171   return a;
00172 }

00177 void RainbruRPG::Gui::AddPlayer::razDialog(){
00178   name->value("");
00179   mail->value("");
00180 }
